entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who lives next door. He is mentioned as being involved in an argument with Percy over a missing Head Boy badge and Scabbers' rat tonic.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is the Head Boy and one of Harry's friends who lives next door. He is mentioned as being involved in an argument with Ron over a missing Head Boy badge.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat. He is mentioned as having a tonic that has gone missing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who lives next door to Ron and Percy. He is mentioned as being involved in an argument with Percy over a missing Head Boy badge.

entities.name: head boy badge
entities.description: The Head Boy badge is a symbol of Percy's position as Head Boy. It has gone missing and is the subject of an argument between Percy and Ron.

entities.name: rat tonic
entities.description: Scabbers' rat tonic is a product that has gone missing. It belongs to Scabbers and is mentioned as being related to the argument between Ron and Percy.

entities.name: number twelve
entities.description: Number twelve refers to the room where Percy lives. The door of this room is ajar and Percy is shouting from inside.

relationships.description: Percy owns the Head Boy badge, which has gone missing.
Ron possesses Scabbers' rat tonic, which has also gone missing.
Harry is suspected by Percy of taking the Head Boy badge.
Ron is also suspected by Percy of taking the Head Boy badge.
